page.title: 06Communications near Kinver
page.content: The Staffordshire and Worcestershire Canal runs from north to south through the middle of the block. This is much used in the summer by holiday cruisers. There are locks at Dunsley and Stourton. The A449 trunk road runs parallel to the canal. Where it by-passes Kinver it is a dual carriageway. It is a very busy road for traffic going from Wolverhampton to the South and linking with the M5 near Worcester. There are many footpaths and bridle-paths in the area. Most of them are passable. The Kinver Civic Society has published a map and guide. Not far north of the block is Halfpenny Green Airfield. This is much used by light aircraft.
